thread.title: Are jumpsuits the new dresses for bridesmaids? An Irish designer gives his opinion
thread.title_full: Are jumpsuits the new dresses for bridesmaids? An Irish designer gives his opinion

title: Are jumpsuits the new dresses for bridesmaids? An Irish designer gives his opinion
text: Are jumpsuits the new dresses for bridesmaids? An Irish designer gives his opinion Independent.ie Irish designer Eamonn McGill told Independent.ie what he thinks about bridesmaids wearing jumpsuits instead of traditional dresses, and why he thinks they're going to take over the bridal scene. http://www.independent.ie/style/fashion/style-talk/are-jumpsuits-the-new-dresses-for-bridesmaids-an-irish-designer-gives-his-opinion-35335732.html http://www.independent.ie/incoming/article35335790.ece/89704/AUTOCROP/h342/keiraedit.png Keira Doyle arrives for her wedding at The Church of The Assumption, Thomastown, Co. Kilkenny. Pic: Colin O'Riordan. Inset: Irish designer Eamonn McGill. Keira Doyle arrives for her wedding at The Church of The Assumption, Thomastown, Co. Kilkenny. PIC COLIN O'RIORDAN Irish designer Eamonn McGill. Irish designer Eamonn McGill told Independent.ie what he thinks about bridesmaids wearing jumpsuits instead of traditional dresses, and why he thinks they're going to take over the bridal scene.
